original_text:
Do not say to your neighbor,
    “Come back tomorrow and I’ll give it to you”—
    when you already have it with you.
korean_text: 네게 있거든 이웃에게 이르기를 갔다가 다시 오라 내일 주겠노라 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Do not say to your neighbor
and I'll give it to you
when you already have it with you
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이미 그것을 가지고 있을 때에
